snoopy.blindnote: 古西：modification site 18S:U1804→U1805に修正。 (20100701末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088. Nicoloso, M., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., Michot, B., Azum, M. C., and Bachellerie, J. P. (1994). U20, a novel small nucleolar RNA, is encoded in an intron of the nucleolin gene in mammals. Mol Cell Biol, 14, 5766-5776. Cavaille, J., Nicoloso, M., and Bachellerie, J. P. (1996). Targeted ribose methylation of RNA in vivo directed by tailored antisense RNA guides. Nature, 383, 732-735.
